Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

Airbomber: You can't=
 fool me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to pose as her...LE=
T ME TALK TO HER!

Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, Infectra. I mean,=
 Armada...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
  Subject: Re: Big P=
ost(with fries)


  Armada



  (Armada listens to the voice coming over he=
r commlink.)


  Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm A=
rmada now. Who is this?


  (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an an=
swer from Arrow.)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Om=
ega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:=
19 PM
    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Airbomber: But where do w=
e go?

    Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

=
    Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen =
this as well.

    Stranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

    Airbom=
ber: But how can that be?

    Arrow: Call her.

    Airbomber: I tried tha=
t.

    Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.=


    Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

    Arrow: Is there anyone named Inf=
ectra there?...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Alloran2@a=
ol.com 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2=
001 4:56 PM
      Subject: Big Post(with fries)


      OOC: Please add the=
 new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
      Syria. 

     =
 :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

      Ramjet: The one extremely =
close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
      by a bot named Pr=
ebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
      and Allian=
ce.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
      of=
 Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
=
      be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
      ~~~~~ 
      Wheelj=
ack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
    =
  ~~~~~ 
      Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximal=
s, for they will 
      be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there ar=
e a lot of warlike 
      Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
      ::he w=
alks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
      ~~~~~ 
      ::Ti=
me Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
    =
  said about Infectra:: 
      Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I di=
dnt know her very well, but she 
      definately wasnt Alliance material! =
 Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
      guys are fools.
